question.text: ___ that her order would not arrive on time, Ms. Chang requested the express delivery option.

answer.explanation: Concerned that + Clause = Fearing that + Clause

question.text: By registering for our online payment plan, customers are authorizing the bank to___ automatic withdrawals on the first day of every month.

answer.explanation: Make withdrawal = Take money from the bank

question.text: Due to the ___ rainfall this spring, water levels in local takes and rivers are much higher than normal.
Civil engineer Lorenzo Raspallo ___ as the guest speaker at the fifth annual Bridge Conservation Colloquium next month.

answer.explanation: The subject is a single person so we choose "has been confirmed".

question.text: Please note that this brochure is intended as information only and does not replace or ___ the product warranty.

answer.explanation: Supplement = Improve/Complete The answer comes after "does not" so we use the original verb form.

question.text: Frequent changes in the market make it hard for stereo equipment producers to anticipate demand with much confidence ___ precision.

answer.explanation:
We only use "nor" when there is "neither".
"Than" goes with "more".
We don't use "but" because "confidence" does not contradict "precision".
Therefore, we choose "or".

question.text: The community swimming pool is not to be used at any time ___ a trained lifeguard is on  duty.

answer.explanation: "Unless" suits the context of the sentence the most.

question.text: The Eisenweg Foundation will soon ___ its funding of externa! scientific research into several new domains, including genetics and endangered languages.
Speaking ___ behalf of the vice president, Alan Lee thanked the employees for their contributions to the fund-raising project.

answer.explanation: On behalf of sb = Instead of sb

question.text: The firm announced on Thursday that its profits rose 15 percent in the first quarter, ___ as a result of its restructuring program.
